column4: I booted the first time with my nextwork cable installed and I get a connection. I then booted without it and then with it again and ubuntu has lost eth0
is it still in this state?
no such device when trying ifup etho
ok, are you using network manager?
I am a gentoo guy lost in gui land right now :)
heh, what does ifconfig show you, no eth0 there?
it does not show with ifconfig -a
wow. All you did was disconnect then reconnect an ethernet cable?
well used the laptop without the connection
you could try: sudo modprobe forcedeth0 - see what happens
sounds like the kernel module may have unloaded
